item.title: Character.AI will offer interactive ‘Stories’ to kids instead of open-ended chat
item.description: The company announced last month that it would no longer allow minors to use its chat features.

item.description: X-59 is designed to achieve supersonic speeds without all that noise.

item.title: David Sacks tried to kill state AI laws — and it blew up in his face
item.description: On Wednesday, a rumor began popping up in Washington about a momentous policy change: the White House, it was said, would issue an executive order on Friday that would finally preempt state AI laws, handing over those regulatory powers to the federal government. The minute it leaked online, lawyers and policymakers began to scour every […]

item.title: ‘Wednesday’ Casts a Goth Icon to Play the Mysterious Aunt Ophelia
item.description: Eva Green, star of 'Penny Dreadful,' as well as Tim Burton's 'Miss Peregrine’s Home for Peculiar Children' and 'Dark Shadows,' has joined season three of the Netflix series.

item.title: Le Huawei Mate 80 prouve une chose : quand ils arrêtent de copier, ils font des choses incroyables
item.description: Vous pensiez que la course aux chiffres était terminée ? Huawei vient de remettre une pièce dans la machine. Avec le Mate 80 Pro Max, on parle de 20 Go de RAM, de deux téléobjectifs périscopiques et d'un écran plus lumineux que votre téléviseur.

item.title: Black Ops 7 Season One arrives soon and adds one of the coolest maps I've seen in Call of Duty
item.description: Call of Duty: Black Ops 7 Season One drops next week and it's one of the biggest updates in series history.

item.title: Warner Music Group partners with Suno to offer AI likenesses of its artists
item.description: Warner Music Group has struck a licensing deal with the AI music creation platform Suno. Under the agreement, WMG will allow users to create AI-generated music on Suno using the voices, names, likenesses, images, and compositions of artists who opt in to the program. WMG, which owns record labels that have signed musicians like Ed […]

item.title: Dick’s joins growing list of companies trimming subsidiary brands with Foot Locker closures
item.description: The retailer says shuttering locations is part of a one-time reset designed to keep Foot Locker from weighing down earnings in 2026. Dick’s Sporting Goods (NYSE: DKS) announced it will close select Foot Locker stores and raised its full-year year outlook, in its third quarter earnings report on Tuesday.

item.title: Huawei a osé ce qu’Apple refuse de faire avec l’iPad Pro et c’est brillant, voici la MatePad Edge
item.description: endant qu'Apple bride ses puces M4 dans des iPad sans ventilateur, Huawei prend le chemin inverse. La nouvelle MatePad Edge débarque avec une promesse simple : des performances maintenues grâce à un système de refroidissement liquide inédit.

item.title: This super-cheap Anker power bank is the biggest bargain of the Black Friday sales
item.description: The Anker PowerCore 10K drops to a super-cheap price for Black Friday on Amazon

item.title: OpenAI corrige enfin le plus gros défaut du mode vocal de ChatGPT
item.description: Vous avez déjà essayé de demander à ChatGPT de commenter une image en mode vocal ? C'était impossible sans jongler entre les écrans. Ce temps-là est révolu. OpenAI déploie une mise à jour qui fusionne enfin le chat textuel et l'expérience vocale.

item.title: The best early Black Friday book deals to add to your cart
item.description: Shop the best early Black Friday book deals, including a buy one, get one 50% off sale at Amazon.

item.title: Inside the Trump administration’s dicey play to block states from regulating AI
item.description: The controversial state-level preemption could be Trump’s payment to the tech industry for helping bring him back to power in 2024. Spurred to action by tech industry lobbyists and insiders, Republicans in the Senate appear to be planning to add language to the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA) that would preempt states from passing laws regulating AI labs. ...

item.title: PC portable avec RTX 5070 et écran 240 Hz : pourquoi ce deal Fnac nous fait hésiter
item.description: C'est la bataille du jour. Face à la promo d'Amazon, la Fnac réplique avec ce MSI Crosshair 16. Même prix, même carte graphique, mais une dalle qui met une claque à la concurrence

item.title: DeepSeek took off as an AI superstar a year ago - but could it also be a major security risk? These experts think so
item.description: DeepSeek-R1’s code output becomes insecure when political topics are included, revealing hidden censorship and serious risks for enterprise deployments.

item.title: All of ByHeart’s recalled baby formula may be contaminated with botulism, tests show
item.description: ByHeart’s baby formula was recalled nationwide on Nov. 11, but some products are still on store shelves. Tests of ByHeart infant formula tied to a botulism outbreak that has sickened dozens of babies showed that all of the company’s products may have been contaminated.

item.description: Get the latest Black Friday deals on Apple products, vacuums, headphones, power stations, and Legos. Save $250 on a new Apple laptop and 27% on a new Kindle.

item.title: Le télescope James-Webb aurait bien découvert un trou noir géant seulement 350 millions d'années après le Big Bang !
item.description: La galaxie Glass-z12 avait déjà été découverte en 2022 et les observations laissaient penser qu'on la voyait seulement 350 à 400 millions d'années après le Big Bang. Après plusieurs années d'études, il semble maintenant qu'elle contient le plus lointain trou noir géant découvert à ce jour, ce...

item.title: ChatGPT’s voice mode is no longer a separate interface
item.description: ChatGPT now lets you use voice and text in the same screen, making conversations feel more natural as responses and visuals appear in real time.

item.title: You can grab two months of Paramount Plus with Showtime for $2.99 a month
item.description: In case you missed it, Paramount Plus is raising prices by $1 a month starting on January 15th, 2026, taking the ad-supported Essential plan from $7.99 to $8.99 and the ad-free Premium plan from $12.99 to $13.99. Thankfully, Paramount’s Black Friday promo has arrived just in time to (somewhat) soften the blow. Now through December […]

item.description: Paramount+ is offering a deep discount for Black Friday.

item.title: Why shoppers may spend less this holiday week—even with more deals
item.description: Deloitte’s survey shows a 4% pullback driven by financial pressure, with Gen X and Boomers slashing budgets the most. If everything feels expensive this year, you’re not alone. The high cost of living is on many Americans’ minds heading into the tail end of the year – a period defined by ceaseless shopping, whether it’s for the Thanksgiving menu or a last minute gift for under the tree....

item.title: Retail sales rose slightly in September as Americans pulled back on spending
item.description: Sales rose 0.2% in September from the previous month, the Commerce Department said Tuesday. Sales at U.S. retailers and restaurants increased modestly in September as resilient consumers moderated their spending after splurging over the summer.

item.title: Oubliez les apirateurs robots à 800 € : l’Ecovacs T50 Pro Omni devient l’affaire du jour
item.description: C'est simple : trouver une station de lavage à eau chaude et un robot avec caméra IA sous les 400 euros, c'était impossible hier. Aujourd'hui, avec ce code promo, ça devient la réalité du marché.

item.title: Warner Music signs deal with AI music startup Suno, settles lawsuit
item.description: WMG says artists and songwriters will have full control over whether and how their names, images, likenesses, voices, and compositions are used in new AI-generated music.

item.title: Earbuds deals are in full swing for Black Friday: See the latest price drops on AirPods, Sony, and Bose buds
item.description: The best Black Friday deals on wireless earbuds include record prices on Apple AirPods, Beats Powerbeats Pro 2, Bose QC earbuds, and tons more.

item.title: ICE Offers Up to $280 Million to Immigrant-Tracking ‘Bounty Hunter’ Firms
item.description: Immigration and Customs Enforcement lifted a $180 million cap on a proposed immigrant-tracking program while guaranteeing multimillion-dollar payouts for private surveillance firms.

item.description: Scammers impersonate TechCrunch employees to steal sensitive data, requiring verification and security measures.
